verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: Stayed upon Jehovah, hearts are fully blest; finding, as He promised, perfect peace and rest.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Hidden in the hollow of His blessed hand, never foe can follow, never traitor stand; not a surge of worry, not a shade of care, not a blast of hurry touch the spirit there. [Refrain]

verse.name: v3
